deathMessages: Do you really want to respawn? Think carefully.
Life is hard. Deal with it!
You are dead... Wait, you already know that.
Did I leave the stove on?
Don't you think it's time for a break?
I know, I know I've let you down... I've been a fool to myself - I thought I could live for no one else
Looks like you got killed by intentional game design.
Your soul has left the confines of this world.
